PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08072024-06-21TC
ActRailway Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Railway Safety Administrative Monetary Penalties Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the RAILWAY SAFETY ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS in order to enable administrative monetary penalties to be imposed in the event of non-compliance with designated provisions of the act and the Passenger Rail Transportation Security Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0152 Publication Date: 2024-07-03
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the RAILWAY SAFETY ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS in order to enable administrative monetary penalties to be imposed in the event of non-compliance with designated provisions of the act and the Passenger Rail Transportation Security Regulations.
